messages.error_server: Error communication with back-end server. Please try again latter
messages.error_format:
Features are not named properly, please rename your Column fields and try again.
Please ensure that your columns are named only in Alphanumeric format (0-9,A-Z,a-z), additional only underscore _ is supported.
For example:
spaces, and all other characters like !#$%&/()=?*+- etc. are not currently supported.

Invalid:
messages.error_read: File could not be read, so no columns can be detected. Please re-check your file, clear cache and try again
